title: Executive Order 8175-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of March 21, 1914
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, the Executive Order of March 21, 1914, creating Public Water Reserve No. 18, is hereby revoked insofar as It pertains to or affects the following-described land in Wyoming:
T. 45 N., R. 64 W., sec. 28, S½SE¼ .
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8175-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of March 21, 1914 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368507
